means: 勒谢尔线，来赫线（用来测射频率的一种传输线）

sentence.Network_en: He is thinking of women all day. What a lecher.
sentence.Network_cn: 他整天琢磨女人, 真是一个色迷.

sentence.Network_en: The old man uses his share to buy raw whiskey and dirty pictures, he a lecher.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个老头儿把自己的一份全部卖了去买纯威士忌酒和下流画片, 他是个色鬼.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French lichiere, lecheor, from lechier 'live in debauchery or gluttony', ultimately of West Germanic origin and related to lick

entry.def: If you describe a man as a lecher, you disapprove of him because you think he behaves towards women in a way which shows he is only interested in them sexually.

auth_sentence.content: Our great challenge was in casting the role of John Barrymore ghost, thespian, and lecher.
